test.create_query: CREATE TABLE bench ENGINE = AggregatingMergeTree() ORDER BY key SETTINGS index_granularity = 8192 AS SELECT CAST(reinterpretAsString(number), 'SimpleAggregateFunction(any, String)') AS key FROM numbers_mt(toUInt64(5e6)) SETTINGS max_insert_threads = 16
test.query: SELECT * FROM bench GROUP BY key SETTINGS optimize_aggregation_in_order = 1, max_threads = 16 FORMAT Null
